titles.title: Stop Deceptive Advertising for Women's Services Act
A bill to direct the Federal Trade Commission to prescribe rules prohibiting deceptive advertising of abortion services.
Stop Deceptive Advertising for Women's Services Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Stop Deceptive Advertising for Women's Services Act - Requires the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) to promulgate rules to prohibit, as an unfair and deceptive act or practice, a person from advertising with the intent to deceptively create the impression that: (1) such person is a provider of abortion services if such person does not provide such services, or (2) such person is not a provider of abortion services if such person does provide such services.
